trans-unit.source: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定哪些屬性應該由型別描述項所報告，特別是 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports an internal mechanism that limits the number of properties on a type that are returned by the custom <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]支援會限制傳回的自訂型別的屬性數目的內部機制<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>類型描述元。

trans-unit.source: If the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is found, the type descriptor narrows the scope of returned properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]找到，類型描述元縮小傳回的屬性的範圍。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> differs from typical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] because you cannot apply it to a class as metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> 不同於一般[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)]因為您無法將它套用至類別，以做為中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The filter mechanism works through code instead of through static metadata.
trans-unit.target: 篩選機制的運作方式執行而不是透過靜態中繼資料的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The options that describe this property filter.
trans-unit.target: 描述這個屬性篩選常式的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> 相比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，以指出目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> 相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> values on each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> for value equality.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作比較<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>上每個值<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>的值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> are the same, then the two <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>都相同，然後這兩個<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>執行個體會相等。

trans-unit.source: Gets the filter options for this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的篩選選項。

trans-unit.source: The property filter options.
trans-unit.target: 屬性篩選常式選項。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A> is the same value as was provided for the `filter` constructor argument when this <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A>是相同的值，因為提供的`filter`建構函式引數時這<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>建構。

trans-unit.source: There is no other means of setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有其他方法設定的<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的 32 位元整數值。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is expected to be a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件必須是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the property filter options of the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] match the property filter options of the provided object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，以指出目前 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的屬性篩選選項是否符合所提供物件的屬性篩選選項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a match exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有相符項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For attributes that store flags, which is true for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Match%2A> result may be different from an <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> result.
trans-unit.target: 針對儲存旗標的屬性，則為 true 的<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Match%2A>結果可能不同於<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A>結果。

trans-unit.source: For example, a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.SetValues> matches a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All>, because <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All> is a merge of all filter values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，篩選的<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.SetValues>符合篩選條件的<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All>，因為<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All>會合併所有的篩選值。
